Message:
Coming back to my lord’s mansion
makes me feel kind of lonely.

I like everyone here,
but this place isn’t my home.

Even if it were just two simple
words, I wish I could hear
their voices again.

Just like the old days,
where I would open the door
and Mom and Dad would...

As I got in the door,
my lord was there
and he called out to me.

His words were ones I had
heard everyday in the past—

words I had so longed to hear
once more...

In that moment, a wave of
memories flooded my mind,
and an endless stream of
tears fell down my cheeks.

With my lord panicking
in front of me,

I finally said the words
I hadn’t been able to say
since that day.
